author: 2 Global Nomads
content: I don't think it's a malware look-like, but pure and simple malware. There must be many others who have been re-installing their systems because of thinking it got infected, and that is exactly what malware does. Malaysia Telekom must stop it now before more people get hurt, and Nervesis need to be stopped, too. That company is charade and there is no artificial or in fact any kind of intelligence in making such a dns-spooting malware and selling it to ISPs. Here is how you can fight them: https://twitter.com/search?q=nervesis%20midas%20malware&src=typd
